item.title: How to run a flutter app offline
item.description: this is my first tutotial git updates were rejected 1 2 git push -f origin main git delete branch 1 2 3 4 5 6 // delete branch locally git branch -d localBranchName // delete branch remotely git push origin --delete remoteBranchName git push -d origin BranchName clean Directory and files 1 git clean -fd Reset all changes done after a commit
